fast download love the game but cannot finish the game...In the room where there is a piano, I cannot complete hidden object!!!! On the list of things you need to find is a lever but there is no lever on the screen and when I click on hint it shows were it should be but its not there!!! I also started playing as a different person but still the same problem. And again on different hidden object I need to find a head but its not there. Without these items I cannot continue on with the game it is so "FRUSTRATING" Any one else with the same problem??????? Please help!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Quite a nice game.. But I also face same problem like without lever & head.. Unable to continue.. Any solution pls...
game works but unable to continue when quit once.
